name: Master Moto 2
description:
Master Moto 2 is a fast paced racing game.This game will take you into a new 3D experience, and enjoy a new track.Master Moto 2 shows you the delicate realistic 3D images.A flexible control, smooth simple game.Desert, toys and other venues, make you more like. Accelerate, jump, win over the barrier, Let you can not stop!

Wait no more and enjoy this addictive game immediately!

Game Features:
1.Astonishing 3D scenes and lovely fresh style.
2.Single player and multiplayer, different form more exciting experience.
3.All kinds of barriers, such as ramp, ladder, windmill and bucket.
4.Performing stunts and show the perfect action.
5.Simulation Sound.

Game skills:
1.Press left/right button or tilt your device to control the rotation of the bike.
2.You must complete the level task.
3.Remember to upgrade your rider, moto and pets.
4.Give “hearts” at a specific time

Trying to win more games, unlock more levels!Galloping on the track and enjoy the game!Don't miss this wonderful 3D motorcycle racing game.
Let's go!
